title: Need help with my ymail address
body:
Hi guys!

This account is old, and i made it with a ymail that i can not acces now, becouse i forgot my password, and i can't recuperate it becouse i don't have the same phone number. Is there any way to change my account ymail without the confirmation mail ? {{champion:17}} {{summoner:1}} {{summoner:6}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: Reach out to our account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking "I need help recovering my account". You may need to verify yourself with the questions, but after that they should be able to help.
